Documents Broadsides Leeser, Isaac and Wise, Isaac Mayer. Philadelphia, PA, A printed letter from Isaac Leeser, Isaac Mayer Wise, and Dr. Lilienthal, calling for a national meeting of Jewish leaders to address the various ills of Judaism in the United States. It asks that all congregations respond to Leeser, as secretary. This was the first known attempt have a national meeting on the ills of Judaism in United States Leeser, Isaac Wise, Isaac Mayer Philadelphia, PA 1849 April 1 Drawer Mixed materials Leeser Folder Philadelphia LSKAP0177_1r.tif; LSKAP0177_2v.tif

Documents Court records Cohen, Philip Jacob. Charleston, SC, A remarkable document issued in Charleston, Carolina, granting freedom to a slave named Peter in 1807. Documents Court records Fleishman, Samuel. Marianna, FL, An important group of three documents chronicling a series of horrific events in Marianna, Jackson County, Florida during which whites and blacks indiscriminately murdered one another during 1869 as a result of the Federal government interfering in local politics. the documents deal with the murder of Samuel Fleishman the operator of a local general store Fleishman, Samuel Marianna, FL 1869 September 28 Drawer Mixed materials Judaica Americana Oversize Folder 4 doc_jal_4_1r.tif; doc_jal_4_1v.tif; doc_jal_4_2r.tif; doc_jal_4_2v.tif; doc_jal_4_3r.tif; doc_jal_4_3v.tif; doc_jal_4_4r.tif; doc_jal_4_4v.tif; doc_jal_4_5r.tif; doc_jal_4_5v.tif; doc_jal_4_6r.tif; doc_jal_4_6v.tif; doc_jal_4_7r.tif; doc_jal_4_7v.tif; doc_jal_4_8r.tif; doc_jal_4_8v.tif

Documents Court records Moren, Jacob Henry and Moduro, Solomon Levy. Curacao, Documents relating to the seizing of a Dutch ship by an English privateer in 1748. The first two are in Dutch with English translations, and attest to the original claim made by the two insurers, Jacob Henry Moren and Solomon Levy Moduro, in the authorized court of the West India Co. in Curacao. They appointed Jacob Rodrigueze Rivera of New York City to act on their behalf. Translated by Issachar Polock in Admiralty Court in Rhode Island in 1758 Moren, Jacob Henry Moduro, Solomon Levy Curacao 1758 November 6 Drawer Mixed materials Judaica Americana Oversize Folder 57 doc_jal_57_1r.tif; doc_jal_57_1v.tif
